titleInfo.title: First electric cars in Baton Rouge

mods.abstract: Image taken at corner of Lafayette and Main Streets showing crowd, streetcars and the Hotel Lafayette. Manuscript note on verso: First electric cars Baton Rouge.

titleInfo.title: Historic Images of Baton Rouge from LSU Libraries
